name: Customr PO Lookup
query:
SELECT
    so.po_no AS "PR No:Data:140",
    so.po_date AS "PR Date:Date:120",
    so.name AS "Sales Order No:Link/Sales Order:180",
    so.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    (
        SELECT soi.custom_feasibility
        FROM `tabSales Order Item` soi
        WHERE soi.parent = so.name
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS "Circuit ID:Data:150"
FROM `tabSales Order` so
WHERE so.docstatus = 1
ORDER BY so.po_date DESC;
